duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively share knowledge and provide a positive customer experience.
Deliver insurance information and solutions to provide a positive customer experience to internal and external customers.
Analyze, clarify and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Attain performance level standards as outlined in performance objectives.
Build effective communication skills to deliver insurance and eligibility information, solutions, and initiatives that provide a positive customer experience to internal and external customers.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four year college degree preferred. Completion of required additional training.
